评论详情: Warm, soft, and purchased in a second color
I was sent a heavily perfumed, worn, and stained shirt.
This fabric made my skin crawl. Returned.
I have washed it. It holds it shape. It keeps me warm. I will be buying more

This shirt is true to size, made of nice and stretchy material, has a thin layer of fleece on the inside that makes it feel extra soft and cozy. Washer and dryer friendly. Not as heavy as a sweatshirt, but still enough to wear something cute in a chilly environment. I wore a thin vest on top of it and ended up removing it. Nice product for the price!
I'm 5'10 and the sleeves are short but the shirt is very short waisted. Can't lift arms because it comes up to navel. Returned the product. Won't order again

A friend recommended I purchased this as an under during the cold winter months. Glad I bought it. It was warm and soft and comfy. Really keeps the heat close to your body and can be worn under sweatshirts and another clothing to insulate.
This long sleeve T is perfect. The fleecy lining inside is so soft and cozy. It's thick without feeling heavy and bulky. The fit is flattering. I'm here to buy a few more in other colors!

评论概述: Warm on the inside but not flattering.
评论详情: I ordered a size Large. I am 140-145 lbs 5'4 1/2 in height. I like this shirt for layering. I purchased the D-wine color. The material on the inside and the outside is soft. It does look like it has a good quality. However, the shirt is not flattering on me in my opinion. I do not particularly love the fit. However, it is warm and I will use it for that purpose, it is also comfortable. I probably would size up if I order the top again, so an XL for comfort, I like my clothes to fit a little baggy, but I would prefer this top to be fitted at the bottom. I give this 4/5 stars. I may or may not purchase it again.
I took off the tags so I can’t return but this runs small and tight on the arms. I usually wear a medium and even if I got a large I think it would be tight on the arms.

Yes, I followed a man to Wash, DC. I’ve found several products t help me through the winters. This shirt is a new favorite and I need to order more. Perfect to size. So comfy! I can’t take it off honestly which is why I need to order three or more in different colors.
So soft in the inside! Fits great!!
A little snug. Washes well. Very warm and great by itself or for layering. Completely opaque in black and white. I hang dry. I started with 1 and I’m up to 5!

Who doesn’t love a black and white striped shirt. The sleeves are a perfect length. The quality is great. It has great stretch and is nice a thick. I have loved it. Fits true to size. I ordered a medium
This shirt is so nice- it is warm and soft in the inside. Fits perfectly- I have a size S and am 120 lbs.
I like the feel of the material.
Unfortunately this top arrived with a flaw so it was returned.
So cute and soft!
Love it but just a lil to short for my liking

Purchased this based on reviews and I'm thrilled! It is a good long length, so whether it's worn tucked or out it provides good back and lower back-bum coverage. I'm 5'7" and this covers almost down to my hips. The sleeves are nice and long and stay in place...no sneaking up the arm. It is a bit thicker fabric than the silky kind, the inside fabric is brushed  making it soft and warm, while the outside is a cotton-ish and matt, not shiny. It isn't see through so can be worn alone, but I find it just right for layering. That is doesn't look like long underwear means it can be worn under vests, too, not just shirts or sweaters. It provides a wonderful warmth. I've worn this under tops and sweaters and alone in the house in NJ winter temps. I love it and am back for more colors.  Definitely recommend this one over the thinner and more expensive brands. It washes well too, but I have to add that I hang my clothes to dry (energy saving).

I bought 2 of these shirts for cold weather days. I'm 5'3 and 112 lbs. The small fit great. I'm 58 yrs old and tend to get cold so I like the fleece material. It keeps me warm. Looks great with jeans or even a pair of dressy pants. Not too long. I love this shirt!

The item arrived on time. I washed it immediately due to a strong odor. I washed it again as the odor was not removed after an initial washing. It's heavy duty and made well, but I don't wear it due to the residual odor remaining. YUCK!

This is a high quality shirt. Looks great, it's thick and fits great without being tight. It's stretchy without getting stretched out while wearing it. Solid and not see through what so ever. I got it on sale and I wished I'd bought several. Still worth full price but I'm on a budget.
Warm inside, love the fitting
What a bright color and it is so amazingly comfortable. I've purchased more!
Fits to size but may want to size up if you’re worried about it being too tight. I love the fit of this top! Wear it a few times a week.
Nice black shirt. Good price.
I ordered a size up for comfort.  Keeps me warm as a layer and is attractive to wear.
not thick and not warm
Very nice quality, not transparent, comfortable, warm
Quality material, well made, perfect fit ~ that’s perfection can’t ask for more!!!!!

I now have three of these thermal shirts because I am a true Medium and they fit well through the bodice, snug but not tight so perfect under another shirt or sweater. Shoulder seams are spaced correctly and sleeves are long enough for my long arms.  The fleece lining is soft against the skin, it makes the material thicker than a Tshirt but not heavy or bulky, and they are quite stretchy.  Colors are nice also.
Kept me nice and warm during the cold football games and went well with my jewelry.
Like the fit; but the fabric is poor quality. I have two of these tops and both were covered in pills after the first wear. Disappointed. Do not recommend.
Loved it all

These shirts are so so warm! I own a horse farm and these shirts are my must have base layer for those winter days on the farm. Had to buy my daughter some as well because she kept trying to steal mine😂. They have  smooth outside with a soft inner lining. Think under armor cold gear, but for half the price! If you work or play outside these are definitely a must have!!
This shirt is soft and great quality
Sweater color is on par with the description. It's comfortable to wear and size seems appropriate to the sizing guide. Fabric is good quality, its. It heavy but it also isnt thin. Good purchase!
Perfect for lounging at home or casual outings. Very soft and warm material. I bought 3: black and white stripe, black and dark blue. Medium: 5.1, 128lbs.
Nice shirt but it will shrink s full size after washing

评论概述: Sizing differs between striped and solid
评论详情: The striped black in Med was smaller/tighter/shorter than the solid white in Med. The tag indicates the striped shirt is a cotton blend. No cotton in the solid color. I usually wear a small, but sized up to a medium and I’m glad I did. The small would have been too tight. I’m returning the striped shirt, and keeping the solid shirt.
Size up one size

Couldn’t love these shirts even more. I like wearing them underneath my vest. I’m a medium but I ordered a Large because I don’t like them sticking to me. A Large worked perfect for me. Highly recommend💯

this is a very nice shirt.  Very stretchy.  a nice weight.  not thermal as I think of it, which to me means thick.  But it is not see thru and is warm.The instructions say wash in cold water and dry on low.  I washed in cool water and dried on normal, which is my fault, but I have an aversion to special care clothes.  I refuse. So if you're like me, buy one size up!  The sleeves shortened at least 2 inches and it tightened up.  But I still like it cause I only will use it to wear under jackets, etc. And its stretchy so is still comfy cozy.

评论概述: Comfortable and nice under a jacket
评论详情: I am so thankful sometimes in my office I don’t know if we’re gonna be hot or it’s gonna be cold but this was perfect. I put a light jacket over it and some black slacks and it looked very dressed up even though I know it was just a thermal top very comfortable. You have to get one.
My office at work is always so cold. This shirt under my scrubs was the perfect solution. It keeps me warm but not too warm, washes well, and is a good quality top. I already purchased more colors.
Warm and pretty.

I purchased this Thermal Shirt because I stay cold and my co-workers stay hot. So we came to an agreement. I purchased this Shirt to wear under other shirts and I stay warm. The arms are long enough and it's so soft and comfortable.  I washed it and the shirt held the color and it kept its shape/form. After I purchased a black shirt, Ipurchased a ivory and navy one as well.  It was worth my money.
The shirt looks great. I was pleasantly surprised by the quality and color. I would highly recommend it.
Nice product..true to size

I hardly ever write reviews but this shirt needed one! It is so soft and comfortable and WARM! I’m always freezing so I bought this to wear under my uniform and it kept me so warm! Will definitely be buying more!!!
Soft yet warm. Heavier than I had hoped for but I am so ecstatic with the product. I WILL be buying more!
Se ve bien, pero el olor a químicos no se le quita con nada, es imposible usarla así

Many reviews state there was a smell to these tops.  I got both white and pink in size large.  Neither has any odor.  In fact they were packaged nicely and are very comfortable.  Perfect for Southern California winters when it gets a little chilly, but not chilly enough for a sweater or for layering!  Also the pink is the exact shade shown!
To small . Will need larger size
This  shrank on the first wash.
Great material ! Thick and soft . Warm for the winter. The fit is flattering.  I already got a stain on it so I will be ordering 2 more !
runs true to size, 200 lbs. and large D cup chest. I got an XL, and it fits perfectly.
Nice fit and bright white. Perfect for a cold day
Great comfort but was small for size. I’ll buy again only a larger size. Washes nicely.
Beautiful, soft material to be under another heavier shirt. Perfect.

OMG...arrived w/in 24 hrs of order.  Fit is snug, like a hug. Soft to feel outside, very warm thin layer of fleece inside.  Fits well, covers my fanny, flattering.  Can wear alone or as an extra layer of winter warmth.  I will DEFINITELY be buying more colors to add to my wardrobe.I'm 5'4", 100 lbs.  XS is perfect and quite flattering.Too cute to wear to bed but comfy enough that I'm tempted to.
Nice fit

I like how this shirt is thin enough to wear under other tops but thick enough that you can’t see through it. I probably wouldn’t wear it in summer months because the inside has a slight fleece/inside-of-sweatshirt feel. Great for the winter though!

评论概述: Nice tops but different colors are different sizes
评论详情: I bought the white one and I absolutely loved it.  I wear a small or medium depending on style and I chose to get a medium.  Fit perfect, comfortable and soft.  Not too thin either for a white top.  Decided to get the black and white striped top.  I got that one in a medium as well and it fits a lot smaller than the white one does.  It doesn’t have as much stretch to it.  The arms are tight and I feel a little constricted.  It is a cute top but I want to exchange it for a larger size but I don’t see that option.  I got it on sale and don’t want to pay more for it.  If I can exchange it, I will, if not, I will have to return it and wait for another sale.
Soft and warm.
I received a green jacket for my birthday, but I had no tops that matched. I ordered this top and it matches my jacket perfectly!  I love the green & white colors and the quality is excellent!
Love.  Love.  Love.  Soft stretchyCan wear to bed can wear alone or w layersWarm warm. Warm.  Med size.  Accurate fit!!!
This is my first time purchasing a 13x6 lace front human hair wig from Amazon.com. The hair smelled good, which is a plus for me. It did not shred, and it was soft, silky, and the lace melted great.
This shirt is worth every penny.
It’s not your typical Thermal shirt, it’s better. Very Warm!
Finally got a chance to try this today and I was SO thankful I had it. Very warm and cozy. Not scratchy and very breathable.
I needed a thermal for winter this year and I ended up ordering one, it's super soft, but the smell of it lingers not sure what It is but it stretches good, the size of it was good as well
These have the nastiest smell! I've watched them 3 times already and I can not get rid of this rancid smell! They're thin and don't work as thermals. They're soft but that's it.

I had high hopes for these shirts... I have washed them 5 times, trying different methods and still cannot get the absolutely horrible smell out of them.... if I could give them a 0 I would.... would NEVER buy these again.... they are comfortable shirts, but can't get past the horrible smell....
It’s very nice and comfy. Only issue is I ordered an xl but it’s too long
I like the way the shirt feels and fits, but it has a chemical smell to it that I cannot get rid of, even after washing it twice!

I found this shirt while looking around for a warm layer to wear under shirts and sweatshirts.  Reviews said that it was very soft and nicely warming.  I put this shirt on the same day it was delivered.  I love it!  It is everything I wanted and I may order another color.
They are nice and soft, but shrinks a whole size.

If you are always cold, these are the tops for you.  And I like that they are a rayon blend.  I got three colors and they all fit a little differently, which yes, is weird, but they are so cheap I don’t care.  Wash up well.  And WARM
I love how this is not bulky yet it’s still very warm! I wear them under my sweaters at work where it’s chilly.
These are very nice shirts. They do keep you warm and I love the fit. However, when you put them in the dryer, they smell like burnt rubber.
I put on this shirt for the first time and notice a hole in the back of the shirt. Money gone down the drain.
Es muy Bonita, pero no es lo suficientemente caliente, el frio pasa fácilmente

I’ve been looking for the perfect winter long-sleeve and I think I’ve found it. I work from home and needed a long sleeve that would keep me warm without having to put on layers. This one works - it’s lined with fleece and feels thicker than the average without looking like it. I also love the neckline - a crewneck that doesn’t look so wrapped around the neck, but not as low as a scoop neck.  Bought three so far. Wish the brown was actually brown because it’s definitely more burnt orange.  I usually buy Small but I bought a Medium to account for shrinkage. Currently it fits fine but looser than I would like, so hopefully after a wash it’ll tighten up.

I like everything about this shirt, fits perfectly, perfectly thick and warm! The color is amazing beautiful hot pink. I brought a extra large it fits perfectly on me! I need to order 2 more, because I work mostly outside it this shirt kept me warm. GREAT BUY LADIES🥰

I like the fabric, style overall but the color was green and looks very gray. I will be keeping it as it’s a nice piece.

I got a white and charcoal. They fit great when I tried them on after getting them. Then I washed them as instructed. Now they are at least one size smaller than they were. They aren’t too tight around but the torso and sleeves are too short now. Basically unwearable.  So disappointing. They seem decently warm though not quite as thick as I was expecting.
